titles.title: And you shall seek Me, and you shall find Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
And you shall seek Me, and you shall find Me
When you shall search for Me with all your heart,
And I will be found of you,
And I will be found of you
When you shall seek Me with all your heart.
And I will be found of you,
And I will be found of you
When you shall seek Me with all your heart.
